computedFields.name: MC_Social_AOV_Band
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when MC_AOV__c is null then null when MC_AOV__c==0 then "$0" when MC_AOV__c>0 and MC_AOV__c<=10000 then "$1-10k" when MC_AOV__c>10000 and MC_AOV__c<=50000 then "$10-50k" when MC_AOV__c>50000 and MC_AOV__c<=100000 then "$50-100k" when MC_AOV__c>100000 and MC_AOV__c<=200000 then "$100k-200k" when MC_AOV__c>200000 and MC_AOV__c<=600000 then "$200k-600k" when MC_AOV__c>600000 and MC_AOV__c<=1000000 then "$600k-1M" when MC_AOV__c>1000000 and MC_AOV__c<=5000000 then "$1M-5M" when MC_AOV__c>5000000 and MC_AOV__c<=10000000 then "$5M-10M" when MC_AOV__c>10000000 and MC_AOV__c<=25000000 then "$10M-25M" else "Other" end

computedFields.name: MC_EMW_AOV_Band
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c is null then null when ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c==0 then "$0" when ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c>0 and ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c<=10000 then "$1-10k" when ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c>10000 and ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c<=50000 then "$10-50k" when ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c>50000 and ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c<=100000 then "$50-100k" when ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c>100000 and ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c<=200000 then "$100k-200k" when ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c>200000 and ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c<=600000 then "$200k-600k" when ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c>600000 and ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c<=1000000 then "$600k-1M" when ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c>1000000 and ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c<=5000000 then "$1M-5M" when ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c>5000000 and ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c<=10000000 then "$5M-10M" when ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c>10000000 and ET_Marketing_Cloud_AOV__c<=25000000 then "$10M-25M" else "Other" end

computedFields.name: MC_Services_AOV_Band
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when MC_ET_Services_AOV__c is null then null when MC_ET_Services_AOV__c==0 then "$0" when MC_ET_Services_AOV__c>0 and MC_ET_Services_AOV__c<=10000 then "$1-10k" when MC_ET_Services_AOV__c>10000 and MC_ET_Services_AOV__c<=50000 then "$10-50k" when MC_ET_Services_AOV__c>50000 and MC_ET_Services_AOV__c<=100000 then "$50-100k" when MC_ET_Services_AOV__c>100000 and MC_ET_Services_AOV__c<=200000 then "$100k-200k" when MC_ET_Services_AOV__c>200000 and MC_ET_Services_AOV__c<=600000 then "$200k-600k" when MC_ET_Services_AOV__c>600000 and MC_ET_Services_AOV__c<=1000000 then "$600k-1M" when MC_ET_Services_AOV__c>1000000 and MC_ET_Services_AOV__c<=5000000 then "$1M-5M" when MC_ET_Services_AOV__c>5000000 and MC_ET_Services_AOV__c<=10000000 then "$5M-10M" when MC_ET_Services_AOV__c>10000000 and MC_ET_Services_AOV__c<=25000000 then "$10M-25M" else "Other" end

computedFields.name: HashtagCheck
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case  
when 'Last_Case_Comment__c' matches "#DUP" then "Duplicate" 
when 'Last_Case_Comment__c' matches "#ANR" then "AE Not Responsive"
when 'Last_Case_Comment__c' matches "#SMA" then "SM Available"
when 'Last_Case_Comment__c' matches "#PPD" then "Postponed"
when 'Last_Case_Comment__c' matches "#TEY" then "Too Early"
when 'Last_Case_Comment__c' matches "#TLT" then "Too Late"
when 'Last_Case_Comment__c' matches "#CNR" then "Customer Non-Responsive"
when 'Last_Case_Comment__c' matches "#AAC" then "AE asked to cancel"
when 'Last_Case_Comment__c' matches "#CNE" then "Customer Not Eligible"
when 'Last_Case_Comment__c' matches "#MORG" then 
"Multiple Org"
when 'Last_Case_Comment__c' matches "#OTH" then "Others"
else "No/Wrong Hashtag"
end
computedFields.label: HashtagCheck

computedFields.name: ACV_Stage
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'StageName' in ["01 - Identifying an Opportunity","02 - Determining Problem,Impact,Ideal","03 - Validating Benefits & Value","04 - Confirming Value With Power","05 - Negotiating $$ & Mutual Plan","06 - Finalizing Closure","07 - Pending"] then "2.Open" when 'StageName'=="08 - Closed" then "1.Won" when 'StageName' in ["Dead - Lost","Dead - No Decision","Dead - No Opportunity","Dead - No Response","Dead - OEM","Dead - Webstore"] then "3.Lost" else "Unbucketed Values" end

computedFields.name: AccountIdKey
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when sfbase__AccountId__c is not null then sfbase__AccountId__c else AccountId end

computedFields.name: ACV_Stage
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Opportunity__c.StageName' in ["01 - Identifying an Opportunity","02 - Determining Problem,Impact,Ideal","03 - Validating Benefits & Value","04 - Confirming Value With Power","05 - Negotiating $$ & Mutual Plan","06 - Finalizing Closure","07 - Pending"] then "2.Open" when 'Opportunity__c.StageName'=="08 - Closed" then "1.Won" when 'Opportunity__c.StageName' in ["Dead - Lost","Dead - No Decision","Dead - No Opportunity","Dead - No Response","Dead - OEM","Dead - Webstore"] then "3.Lost" else "Unbucketed Values" end

parameters.saqlFilter:
(
 (
 'CreatedById.sf62user__manager__c.UserRoleId.Name' matches "EMEA - " ||
 'CreatedById.sf62user__manager__c.UserRoleId.Name' matches "UKI - " ||
 'CreatedById.sf62user__manager__c.UserRoleId.Name' matches "UK - " ||
 'CreatedById.sf62user__manager__c.UserRoleId.Name' matches "APAC - " ||
 'CreatedById.sf62user__manager__c.UserRoleId.Name' matches "LACA - "
 ) 
 &&
 !(
 'CreatedById.sf62user__manager__c.UserRoleId.Name' matches "NP - " ||
 'CreatedById.sf62user__manager__c.UserRoleId.Name' matches "CFL - " ||
 'CreatedById.sf62user__manager__c.UserRoleId.Name' matches "CSG - " ||
 'CreatedById.sf62user__manager__c.UserRoleId.Name' matches "Nonprofit"
 )
 )
